sentences.en: " Thy voice, and suddenly grow grey with fear, And tremble and despoil themselves: 0 hear! "
sentences.cn: 听到你的声音, 它们已吓得发青: 一边颤栗,一边自动萎缩: 哦,你听!

sentences.en: And tremble and despoil themselves : 0 hear!
sentences.cn: 一边颤栗,一边自动萎缩: 哦,你听!

sentences.en: And tremble and despoil themselves : oh hear!
And tremble and despoil themselves: O hear!
sentences.cn: 颤抖着自我掠夺起来: 哦听!

sentences.en: He used his ruthless and destructive armies despoil everybody who lived within reach of his realm.
sentences.cn: 他动用其破坏性的军队残暴地掠夺国内的人民.

sentences.en: The diseases usually can despoil of young.
sentences.cn: 这些疾病常会夺走年轻的生命.

sentences.en: The victorious army despoil the city of all its treasure.
sentences.cn: 得胜的军队把城里的财宝劫掠一空。

trans.tran_en: to steal from a place or people using force, especially in a war
to make a place much less attractive by removing or damaging things
